Audio.Locality: 15 km east of São Jose dos Pinhais, Paraná
Audio.Author: Teus Luijendijk
Audio.Comments: Recording slightly filtered (below 600 Hz).Bird quite close, though not seen. Same calls audible as in XC59015, but unfortunately not in this recording.One song strophe presented here, lasting 2 min 22 s.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
